A little about me

I am a graduate student in Robotics Engineering at Worcester Polytechnic Institute. My research interests lies in computer vision, deep learning and Surgical Robotics. I am aspiring to make neural networks and computer vision models for living.

I have three years of software development experience in enterprice applications development and working with large code bases for debugging, performance tuning and business logic implementations

Contact Me

Around the Web

Pose Estimation using Deep Learning on Visual and LiDAR Odometry

~Implemented Recurrent - Convolutional Neural Network to learn the spatio-temporal representation from the RGB image sequences in KITTI odometry dataset

~Used LSTM to take optical flow learnt by CNN as input and predict the robot’s pose in 6 Degrees of Freedom

~Used PCL to extract feature descriptors from LiDAR Point cloud data and implemented Pointnet neural network architecture to estimate robot’s poses

  • Date: Mar 2018 - Present
  • Domain: Deep Learning, Localization, Odometry

Real Time Vehicle Detection for Self-Driving Car using CNN

~Trained Deep Convolutional Neural Network on GTI vehicle image dataset and achieved 98% accuracy

~Implemented transfer learning to detect vehicles in high dimensional images/videos from KITTI benchmark

  • Code Repository Link
  • Date: Nov 2017 - Dec 2017
  • Domain: Deep Learning, Computer Vision

Coursera Deep Learning Specialization

~Successfully completed first 2 courses - Neural Networks and Deep Learning, Improving Deep Neural Networks

~Implemented shallow and deep Neural Networks from scratch

~Learnt to model cost functions, back propagation and various activation functions(sigmoid, ReLU, softmax)

~Learnt and implemented regularization(L2, dropout), and optimizers(ADAM, RMSProp, etc)

  • Code Repository Link
  • Date: Dec 2017 - Present
  • Domain: Deep learning, Computer Vision

Autonomous Robotic capture of flying objects using visual servoing

~Developed simulation environment in V-REP for ABB IRB 140 Robot using ROS

~Used Microsoft Kinect to predict object’s trajectory using OpenCV and curve fitting

~Solved the problem of slow data acquisition using ROS and achieved real-time performance

~Implemented PID controller for 6-DOF robot arm to capture the objects in flight through visual feedback

  • Code Repository Link
  • Date: Feb 2018 - Present
  • Domain: Robot Control, Visual Servoing, Object Tracking, Computer Vision

Haptic Virtual Interaction with the Da Vinci Surgical Robot

~Developed surgical simulator with haptic feedback using CHAI3D, OpenGL and Bullet Physics engine

~Built ROS interface for da vinci and Geomagic touch haptic device to interact with the surgical environment

~Developed an incision practice module and integrated Novint Falcon haptic device for surgical practice in simulation. Developed master-slave teleoperation module for surgical training in simulation

  • Code Repository Link
  • Date: Feb 2017 - May 2018
  • Domain: Haptics, Surgical Simulation, Robot Dynamics, Bullet Physics

Deep reinforcement Learning - Deep Q Learning for cart pole environment

~Implemented Model Free Deep QLearning algorithm in Tensorflow

~Used Open AIs cart pole environment to test the algorithm on an inverted pendulum model

  • Date: Oct 2017 - Dec 2017
